languages.text: "Даже твой несчастный зверь, которого мон-кай превратили в оружие, может стать добычей. Ступай осторожно и не гневи Лилэтан".

traits.locale_text: "Даже твой несчастный зверь, которого мон-кай превратили в оружие, может стать добычей. Ступай осторожно и не гневи Лилэтан".

languages.text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."
languages.original_text: "Даже твой несчастный зверь, которого мон-кай превратили в оружие, может стать добычей. Ступай осторожно и не гневи Лилэтан".

traits.locale_text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."
"Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."
"Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."
"Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."
"Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."
"Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイどもに武器へと変えられた、お前のあの哀れな獣ですら、この森では獲物になるかもしれない。慎重に歩け。リラエタンを怒らせるな」
languages.original_text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイどもに武器へと変えられた、お前のあの哀れな獣ですら、この森では獲物になるかもしれない。慎重に歩け。リラエタンを怒らせるな」

languages.text: "Selbst Euer reumütiges Untier, das die Chem-Pan-Sey in eine Waffe verwandelt haben, könnte in diesen Wäldern zur Beute werden. Seid vorsichtig, und erzürnt die Lileath nicht."
languages.original_text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst Euer reumütiges Untier, das die Chem-Pan-Sey in eine Waffe verwandelt haben, könnte in diesen Wäldern zur Beute werden. Seid vorsichtig, und erzürnt die Lileath nicht."

languages.text: « Même ce pauvre animal que les mon-keigh ont changé en arme pourrait faire une proie dans ces forêts. Faites preuve de prudence et veillez à ne pas provoquer la colère de la lilaethan. »
languages.original_text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."

traits.locale_text: « Même ce pauvre animal que les mon-keigh ont changé en arme pourrait faire une proie dans ces forêts. Faites preuve de prudence et veillez à ne pas provoquer la colère de la lilaethan. »

languages.text: «Incluso tu penosa bestia, que los mon-keigh han transformado en un arma, podría ser una presa en este bosque. Avanzad con cuidado, y procurad no irritar al Lilaethan».
languages.original_text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso tu penosa bestia, que los mon-keigh han transformado en un arma, podría ser una presa en este bosque. Avanzad con cuidado, y procurad no irritar al Lilaethan».

languages.text: “即便是那只被猴子改造成武器的可怜畜生，在这片森林里也可能会沦为猎物。要当心，不要激怒莉莱赞。”
languages.original_text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."

traits.locale_text: “即便是那只被猴子改造成武器的可怜畜生，在这片森林里也可能会沦为猎物。要当心，不要激怒莉莱赞。”

languages.text: "Mon-keigh'in silah gibi kullandığı o zavallı yaratık bile bu ormanlarda av olabilir. Dikkatli olmak gerek, Lilaethan'ı kızdırmamalı."
languages.original_text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighin silah gibi kullandığı o zavallı yaratık bile bu ormanlarda yem olabilir. Dikkatli olun, Lilaethan'ı kızdırmayın."

languages.original_text: "Even your rueful beast whom the mon-keigh have turned into a weapon may become prey in these forests. Tread carefully, and do not anger the Lilaethan."
